item.title: Super Bowl 60 is set and it's a rematch from 11 years ago: Patriots vs. Seahawks
Winter storm live updates: At least 18 dead across the US
item.description: A massive winter storm that stretches 2,000 miles has knocked out power to hundreds of thousands of people.

item.title: WATCH: Snowboarding in Central Park
item.description: As the winter storm comes to a wrap, some Americans are taking advantage by enjoying a snow day in Central Park in New York City.

item.title: A minute-by-minute timeline of the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by federal agents
item.description: In total, 10 shots were fired in less than five seconds, according to a forensic audio analysis of the videos conducted for ABC News.

item.title: WATCH: American climber reaches new heights
item.description: Alex Honnold climbed Taipei 101, a 1,667-foot tall skyscraper without ropes or a safety net in just 90 minutes.
